com.mindtree.dao.jdbc

Class DBUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mindtree.dao.jdbc.DBUtil

  • public class DBUtil
extends Object
    Author:
    M1030608 This class provides utility methods for establishing and releasing database connection. It provides methods to release various resources used in database connection.
